attributes.action: legalise the use of a megaphone to worn pedestrians at night time whilst driving on country roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think if there are two people in a car and it is dark and your on a country road we should be allowed to use it to war other road users and pedestrians of your possision on the road

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
